content:
Among other topics, we plan to vote on these changes to US CORE during this week's StructuredDocuments Call 2nd hr only 11-12 Eastern:

- After extension discussion and review, we have several proposed changes to the US Core Security Page pre-applied here for your review.
- After extension discussion and review proposed changes to the guidance on version discovery here

let me know if you have any concerns or questions
@Eric Haas has there been any discussion about supporting multiple versions on the same end-point and the $versions operation?

we talked about this and we have this page to discuss versions
<https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/US-Core-R4/r2-r4-guidance.html>... No
vendors support multiple version on a single endpoint as far as I know.

Eric

Eric M Haas, DVM, MS
Health eData Inc
35 Crescent Avenue, Sausalito, CA 94965
